defaultSize

protected int defaultSize

forceBufferFlush

protected boolean forceBufferFlush
setting this to true will force the buffer to be updated on the next call to paintScaled. Note this will not disable buffer all together. after the buffer has been updated, this variable will be set to false. if you want to disable buffering (why would you do that?), you'd need to set bufferScale to false.

paintScaled

public void paintScaled(GeoGraphics gg)
Paints a scaled version of the layer to the given graphics contex.
Generaly only called by a theme that contains this layer.
08/May/2000 - fixed bug#103835 bufferd redraw nologer throws null pointer exception.
Parameters:
gg - A GeoGraphics containing all of the info needed to paint this layer to screen

paintHighlight

public void paintHighlight(java.awt.Graphics g,
                           Scaler scale,
                           int id,
                           ShadeStyle style)
Description copied from interface: Layer
Highligts the specified feature. A simple version of paintScaled, this is used to paint a single feature in some way that make it stand out from the other features.
Todate, this has been by using a bright red colour, a more user-definable system maybe implemented in later versions.
Again the only thing that sould call this is a Theme
Following copied from interface: uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.Layer
Parameters:
g - A Graphics object to paint the highlighted feature to.
scale - A scaler that can be used to scale the feature.
id - An int for the ID of the feature to be highlighted.
style - A style with hints on how to display the highlight
See Also:
Theme

setDefaultSize

public void setDefaultSize(int size)

getID

public int getID(GeoPoint p,
                 Scaler s)
Find the feature that contains this point. Note This method will return the first feature found to contain the point only, even if multiple, overlapping features, contain the same point.
Specified by:
getID in interface LockableSize
Parameters:
point - The GeoPoint to test each feature against.
Returns:
int The ID of the first feature to contain this point, -1 if no feature was found

scaleChanged

public void scaleChanged(ScaleChangedEvent sce)
Called when the scale last used to scale this layer has changed. as a result the buffer is of no use and will have to be rebuilt next paint scaled
Parameters:
sce - A ScaleChangedEvent as thrown by a scaler.

isScaleBufferImplemented

public boolean isScaleBufferImplemented()
Use to determine if scale buffering is available for this layer. Layers that use this feature should overide this mehtod.
Overrides:
isScaleBufferImplemented in class ShapeLayer
Returns:
boolean true if scale buffering can be used.
